requirements.summary: Remove all Gmail/Google login UI elements, imports, handlers, and state from LoginPage.tsx while preserving Internet Identity authentication
acceptanceCriteria: The login page renders with no Gmail or Google login button.
No Google OAuth imports, SDK scripts, or handler functions remain in LoginPage.tsx or any other frontend file.
Internet Identity login continues to work correctly.
No console errors related to missing Google libraries or configurations.

file_operations.description: Remove all Gmail/Google login functionality including: any Google OAuth imports or SDK references, Google login button/UI elements, Google authentication state variables, Google authentication handler functions, and any conditional rendering logic for Google sign-in. Retain all Internet Identity login functionality, the useInternetIdentity hook, the existing page layout, feature highlights, and the Internet Identity login button. Ensure no remnants of Google authentication remain in the component.
